方法详细信息

getSelenium

protected LoggingSelenium getSelenium(java.lang.String resName,
                                      java.lang.String port)
create LoggingSelenium instance.

参数：
resName - result file name to write logs
port - the server prot to start selenium servers
返回：
LoggingSelenium instance
抛出：
java.lang.RuntimeException

startServer

protected void startServer(java.lang.String portList,
                           java.lang.String className)
choose a port to start the selenium server.

参数：
portList - the list of port can be used as selenium servers
className - the testcase's class name running to use this server
抛出：
java.lang.RuntimeException

pause

protected void pause(long millis)
wait milli seconds.

参数：
millis - time to wait, in millisecond

startSelenium

protected void startSelenium()
start selenium.

抛出：
java.lang.RuntimeException

protected void closeSelenium()
close selenium opened browser session.

抛出：
java.lang.RuntimeException

protected void stopSelenium()

stopServer

protected void stopServer()
stop the selenium server

public void testTermination()

distinctName

private java.lang.String distinctName(java.lang.String dir,
                                      java.lang.String fileName,
                                      java.lang.String fileType)
choose a port to start the selenium server.

参数：
dir - file location
fileName - file name to judge
fileType - file type such as ".html"
返回：
if file exists then add mark by time
